doc.title: Not My Type
doc.plot: Jason takes us on a journey of self discovery as he looks back at the key moments that defined himself and his relationships. He goes through two short lived relationships with girls before almost accidentally stumbling upon a gay web site that causes his to seriously contemplate his true feelings and how to deal with them. An encounter with another man that he meets on the Internet turns into one of the scariest, yet most exhilarating nights of his life, opening a new door for Jason to move forward in his relationships and find comfort in his own skin.
